bug.author: python273
bug.summary: [BUG] New backup script: copying id_rsa fails
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>@ pulling from 10.0.0.2 ... pwnagotchi.log 100% 20MB 1.9MB/s 00:10 config.yml 100% 707 322.6KB/s 00:00 fingerprint 100% 64 44.3KB/s 00:00 default.yml 100% 9029 907.7KB/s 00:00 scp: /tmp/backup/etc/pwnagotchi/id_rsa: Permission denied id_rsa.pub 100% 741 101.3KB/s 00:00 brain.json 100% 134 82.4KB/s 00:00 </denchmark-code>
Running on 1.0.1 image, not sure if permissions are set in new image, but seems like good idea to set it to copied files anyway
